issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: In {{new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss")}}, 'hh' should be 'HH'. The bug was fixed in the production code by HADOOP-13235, but not fixed in the test code.
Alison asked to be assigned this JIRA, she's going to take a look.
Hi [~alisonyu], how is this issue going on?

Looks like the quote was accidentally changed from a normal double quote to a left double quote, causing the compilation failures.

Alison, could you change the quote back? Otherwise it looks fine. Recommend using a plain text editor like textedit or sublime text.
I posted a new patch using VI. It should work now.
